[url=https://discord.gg/v3gYmYamGJ][img]https://img.shields.io/badge/Discord-7289da?logo=discord&logoColor=fff&style=flat-square[/img][/url][url=https://ko-fi.com/jodsderechte][img]https://custom-icon-badges.demolab.com/badge/-Support-lightgrey?style=flat-square&logo=kofi&color=222222[/img][/url] [url=https://www.twitch.tv/Jodsderechte][img]https://custom-icon-badges.demolab.com/badge/-Catch%20me%20Live-lightgrey?style=flat-square&logo=Twitch&color=22283D[/img][/url]

[b][color=#ff0000][size=34][/size][/color][/b]
I do not plan to become a Class Aura maintainer I'm merely creating auras for my Personal use 

All Class Packs:
[list]
[*][url=https://wago.io/DemonHunter][color=#A330C9]Havoc Demon Hunter[/color][/url] 
[*][url=https://wago.io/BalanceDruid][color=#FF7C0A]Balance Druid[/color][/url]
[*][url=https://wago.io/Warlock][color=#8788EE]Warlock[/color][/url]
[*][url=https://wago.io/ElementalShaman][color=#0070DD]Elemental Shaman[/color][/url]
[*][url=https://wago.io/Paladin][color=#F48CBA]Retribution Paladin[/color][/url]
[*][url=https://wago.io/ShadowPriest][color=#FFFFFF]Shadow Priest[/color][/url]
[*][url=https://wago.io/DeathKnight][color=#C41E3A]Frost DK[/color][/url]
[*][url=https://wago.io/AugEvoker][color=#33937F]Aug Evoker[/color][/url]

[/list]
[b][color=#ff0000]
To get the Aura Visually the exact same you need [url=https://www.wowinterface.com/downloads/info25064-CleanIcons-MechagnomeEdition]Clean Icons-MechagnomeEdition[/url] and [url=https://www.curseforge.com/wow/addons/omni-cc]omnicc[/url]
[/color][/b]
Auras Visually Inspired by [url=https://wago.io/LuxthosDruidDragonflight]Luxthos[/url] but with less shenanigans
Every feedback/help is greatly appreciated feel free to contact me by joining my [url=https://discord.gg/v3gYmYamGJ]Discord[/url].


If you like my work and want to support me you can [url=https://www.paypal.com/donate/?hosted_button_id=PSQ4D3HXNZKMG]donate[/url]
description.html:
I do not plan to become a Class Aura maintainer I'm merely creating auras for my Personal use All Class Packs:
  • Havoc Demon Hunter
  • Balance Druid
  • Warlock
  • Elemental Shaman
  • Retribution Paladin
  • Shadow Priest
  • Frost DK
  • Aug Evoker
To get the Aura Visually the exact same you need Clean Icons-MechagnomeEdition and omnicc Auras Visually Inspired by Luxthos but with less shenanigans Every feedback/help is greatly appreciated feel free to contact me by joining my Discord. If you like my work and want to support me you can donate

changelog.text: fixed Astral power bar to show incorrect values
fixed wrong grow of small icons group
fixed pixel perfect issue and removed unneccesary checks for AstralPower bar
- added power prediction to ap bar
